v-----Think it's cool? Great. Let's talk.

How did I make this? First, obviously, I got a pumpkin. I then proceeded to cut a hole in the top, and scoop out the... weird stuff. And seeds. Then, I traced out the face and but it out. I put the candle in, and that's where this project goes a little bit into kerbal territory. What happened was I took a t-shirt I had of KSP, and taped it on so it looked like a kerbal space helmet. I put that extra candle (cuz I had it) on where the fire should be coming out of the rocket in the logo, and that's basically how I made it.

Cheers, Raincrafter.

Edited October 11, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER
